desc: The goal of the course is to acquire the knowledge, skills, and understandings necessary to develop, implement and assess a general music program for grades 5-12. Required field experience component. Prerequisite: Education 330, 355. Offered annually in the first half of the fall semester.
name: Tchg Music-Mid/High S
notes: Open to rising Seniors and Juniors only.
title: Teaching of Music in the Middle and High School
